TITLE: Deploying Lago Locally with Docker Compose - Fresh Installation
DESCRIPTION: Commands for setting up Lago locally for the first time using Docker. This process includes cloning the repository, generating an RSA key, starting the API, creating the database, and launching all components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Get the code
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/getlago/lago.git

# Go to Lago folder
cd lago

# Set up environment configuration
echo "LAGO_RSA_PRIVATE_KEY=\"`openssl genrsa 2048 | base64`\"" >> .env
source .env

# Start the api
docker compose up -d api

# Create the database
docker compose exec api rails db:create
docker compose exec api rails db:migrate

# Start all other components
docker compose up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Lago Docker Container
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the Lago Docker container, exposing ports 80 and 3000 for the UI and API respectively. This command starts all Lago services in a single container.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/docker/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -d --name lago -p 80:80 -p 3000:3000 getlago/lago:latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Local Docker Compose Deployment
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the Lago project using Docker Compose, with options for foreground or background execution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up --profile all

# If you want to run it in the background
docker compose up -d --profile all
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating an Existing Lago Installation with Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Simple command to update an existing Lago installation by running Docker Compose to pull the latest images and restart all containers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Running Lago Events Processor
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build and execute the events processor service using Go build command. Creates an executable named event_processors and runs it.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/events-processor/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
go build -o event_processors .

./event_processors
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Downloading Local Docker Compose Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Fetches the docker-compose file for local deployment from the Lago GitHub repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -o docker-compose.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/getlago/lago/main/deploy/docker-compose.local.yml
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Docker Compose Profile Configuration Examples
DESCRIPTION: Various Docker Compose commands demonstrating different profile configurations for selective service deployment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Start all services
docker compose up --profile all

# Start without PostgreSQL
docker compose up --profile all-no-pg

# Start without Redis
docker compose up --profile all-no-redis

# Start without PostgreSQL and Redis
docker compose up --profile all-no-db

# Start without RSA keys generation
docker compose up --profile all-no-keys

# Start without PostgreSQL, Redis and RSA keys generation
docker compose up
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Development Deployment Command
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the events processor in development mode using the lago command line tool with docker compose.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/events-processor/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
lago up -d events-processor
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Traefik Environment Variables
DESCRIPTION: Environment variable configuration for Traefik deployment with domain and email settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
LAGO_DOMAIN=domain.tld
LAGO_ACME_EMAIL=email@domain.tld
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Deployment Without PostgreSQL
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the deployment without PostgreSQL service after configuring external database variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up --profile all-no-pg
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Deployment Without Redis
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the deployment without Redis service after configuring external Redis instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up --profile all-no-redis
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Deployment Without RSA Keys Generation
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the deployment without RSA keys generation service, using external RSA key configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up --profile all-no-keys
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Downloading Traefik Docker Compose Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Downloads the Docker Compose configuration files for Traefik deployment setup including environment variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/getlago/lago/blob/main/deploy/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -o docker-compose.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/getlago/lago/main/deploy/docker-compose.traefik.yml
curl -o .env https://raw.githubusercontent.com/getlago/lago/main/deploy/.env.traefik.example
```
